definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on

sentences.chinese: 但在海底，拖網捕魚是很殘酷的。

sentences.english: The method is applicable to foot lines of two-boat bottom trawls.
sentences.chinese: 本發明用於雙船底層拖網下綱。

sentences.english: Bottom trawling can target cod down to 200 meters or so.
sentences.chinese: 拖網作業則可捕到200米甚至更深處的鱈魚。

sentences.english: The oil industry uses supercomputers to trawl seismic data before drilling wells.
sentences.chinese: 石油公司可以在鑽井之前先拖網分析地震數據。

sentences.english: The policemen are dragging the river for the body of the missing boy.
sentences.chinese: 警察在河底用拖網打撈失蹤男孩的屍體。

sentences.english: The Fairtry was to be the first of many stern trawlers all over the world.
sentences.chinese: “費爾特里”號可算得上世界上第一艘尾拖網船了。

sentences.english: He and i were shipmates on a trawler once.
sentences.chinese: 我與他一度同在一艘拖網船上工作。

sentences.english: The fishmen hauled the fish into the boat.
sentences.chinese: 漁港裏停泊着幾艘拖網漁船。

sentences.english: He and i were shipmates on a trawler once.
sentences.chinese: 第四架飛機在一艘荷蘭拖網漁船旁迫降。

sentences.english: Hammer dredge is a technical improvement of the existing dredge sampler.
sentences.chinese: 重錘式拖網取樣器是對現行常規拖網的技術改進。

sentences.english: Hammer dredge is a technical improvement of the existing dredge sampler.
sentences.chinese: 重錘式拖網取樣器是對現行常規拖網的技術改進。
